ivardefs.name: effectiveTime
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the time during which this Contract Term ValuedItem information is effective.

ivardefs.name: factor
ivardefs.desc: A real number that represents a multiplier used in determining the overall value of the Contract Provision Valued Item delivered. The concept of a Factor allows for a discount or surcharge multiplier to be applied to a monetary amount.

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: Identifies a Contract Provision Valued Item instance.

ivardefs.name: net
ivardefs.desc: Expresses the product of the Contract Provision Valued Item unitQuantity and the unitPriceAmt. For example, the formula: unit Quantity * unit Price (Cost per Point) * factor Number  * points = net Amount. Quantity, factor and points are assumed to be 1 if

ivardefs.name: points
ivardefs.desc: An amount that expresses the weighting (based on difficulty, cost and/or resource intensiveness) associated with the Contract Provision Valued Item delivered. The concept of Points allows for assignment of point values for a Contract ProvisionValued Item,

ivardefs.name: quantity
ivardefs.desc: Specifies the units by which the Contract Provision Valued Item is measured or counted, and quantifies the countable or measurable Contract Term Valued Item instances.

ivardefs.name: unitPrice
ivardefs.desc: A Contract Provision Valued Item unit valuation measure.
